name: Cisco | IOSXR | Config | Config Changed (SYSLOG)
description: RP/0/RSP0/CPU0:Oct 19 20:29:37.103 : config[65891]: %MGBL-CONFIG-6-DB_COMMIT : Configuration committed by user 'cisco'. Use 'show configuration commit changes 1000000783' to view the changes.

patterns.value_re: %MGBL-CONFIG-6-DB_COMMIT : Configuration committed by user '(?P<user>.+)'. Use 'show configuration commit changes (?P<changeset>\d+)' to view the changes.
